body: Egypt-based Issandr El Amrani, writing at The Arabist, is in Tunisia, and blogging from the ground. "I'll be reporting from here for various publications, but most of it won't be news — it will be long pieces to try and dig deeper into the Tunisian revolution and where it's headed, also providing some historical perspective. I hope to have the time to discuss some of the day to day developments and snapshots of life here," he explains.
original_body: Egypt-based Issandr El Amrani, writing at The Arabist, is in Tunisia, and blogging from the ground. "I'll be reporting from here for various publications, but most of it won't be news — it will be long pieces to try and dig deeper into the Tunisian revolution and where it's headed, also providing some historical perspective. I hope to have the time to discuss some of the day to day developments and snapshots of life here," he explains.
title: Egypt: Live from Tunisia
